/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the street, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and bicycles are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the city's vibrant life and constant movement. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
